rules_text:
First strike, haste 
Whenever a creature dies, you may exile the top card of your library, if you don't transform N.
If you are stagnant, you may play cards exiled with N. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“There can only be one me! And I am it!”[/i]
rules_text2:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0, gains first strike, haste, and “You may cast cards exiled with Sword of the End.” If that creature is named Mio or M it gets an additional +2/+2 and also gains indestructible.
Equip {3}
